title: How would this laptop run League
body:
I wonder how this laptop would run League
How much FPS would it have on the different settings.
Intel core i5 7200U
Dual core
2.5 Ghz- turbo frequency 3.1 Ghz
8 Gb ram

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950M

4000 MB

Thanksss

replies.body: Double check those specs against our [**minimum specs page **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654), but as far as I can tell you should be alright!
